title: unable to keep my bookmarks on firefox browser
content:
I customized my firefox browser yesterday, using the blue stars and saving all my passwords; still, this morning again, when I opened firefox browser (for Mac), there are zero bookmarks, no passwords saved...

How does this work? can anyone give me a hint?
creator: sonja.heuberger

title: Bookmark importer from Chrome
content: I have recently migrated back to Firefox from Chrome. I followed the instructions to import my bookmarks and forgot that I was logged into my work chrome account, so those bookmarks were imported. When I followed the same procedure using my personal google account, the procedure did not work. Is there a way to import bookmarks from multiple google accounts into Firefox? Any help here would be greatly appreciated. Thank you!
creator: jake.ap.rogers

title: Previous sessions (and closed Tabs)
content:
It would be nice for Firefox to have more than just the last open session available. I recently had to close my browser a couple times to restart my mac. When I re-opened Firefox, the previous open session was gone. It would be nice if the browser had a way of saving not only the very last previous open session but earlier ones.

Maybe someone knows how to easily access those. It seems as though Chrome has started saving earlier sessions.
creator: john.wroughton

title: Extensions | Allow Automatic Updates | Default vs. On
content: In the extension settings where the options are for allowing automatic updates, what does the "Default" setting do?
creator: keylonta

title: Firefox logs me out of everything whenever I close it.
content: Every time I close Firefox windows, I'm logged out of all websites I had been logged in to. This doesn't happen automatically at a certain point in time, it only happens when I close all windows. I already tried the about:config thing that was in the solution for another person who had a similar problem, but it didn't work. This has been going on for about a month or two now.
creator: nik.mwango

title: Firefox Keeps Going Unresponsive After 10 to 30 minutes
content: Firefox keeps going unresponsive after 10 to 30 minutes. I tried creating a new places thing. It didn't work, and oddly still let me restore my old session and kept my bookmarks, which it said I'd have to re-install. I'm only running two extensions, U-block and NoScript. It will go Unresponsive, remain so far minutes at a time, briefly return and then immediately go unresponsive again, just long enough for me to close a tab or shut down. Nothing I have done seems to fix this. I am on the latest Windows 10, Desktop, latest Firefox.
creator: WindthinD
